response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～凶鬼地霊～
response.overview: This is the "~Wicked Demons and Earthly Spirits~" version of the series, which contains horrifying footage submitted by viewers. This time, we have included footage that clearly shows the ferocious appearance of those from other worlds who have accumulated resentment and bitterness, and have become vengeful spirits. Is this revenge against this world, or is it a random grudge?
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Malevolent Demon Earth Spirits
